posemuckel.client.gui
Class InvitationDialog

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.jface.window.Window
      org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog
          posemuckel.client.gui.InvitationDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.jface.window.IShellProvider
public class InvitationDialog
extends org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog

This class provides the Dialog for invitations that are sent out to users when a new project is created. It is called by posemuckel.client.gui.InvitationInfo

Constructor Detail

InvitationDialog

public InvitationDialog(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell,
                        java.lang.String addressee,
                        java.lang.String project,
                        java.lang.String description,
                        java.lang.String owner)
Constructor

Parameters:
shell - parent shell
addressee - the name of the user who is being invited
project - the project name the user is being invited to
description - the description of the project
owner - the owner of the project (and sender of the invitation)
